mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY i.INV_IDX) AS rowNum, i.INV_IDX AS invIdx, g.GRO_IDX AS groIdx, g.GRO_NAME AS groName, i.INVITE_CODE AS inviteCode, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ITM_SHARE_PERMISSION p WHERE p.GRO_IDX = i.GRO_IDX AND p.OWNER_MEM_IDX = #{regIdx} AND p.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' ) AS shareCnt, i.REG_DATE AS regDate FROM ITM_SHARE_INVITE i JOIN ITM_GROUP g ON g.GRO_IDX = i.GRO_IDX WHERE i.REG_IDX = #{regIdx} AND i.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY rowNum DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ITM_SHARE_INVITE i JOIN ITM_GROUP g ON g.GRO_IDX = i.GRO_IDX WHERE i.REG_IDX = #{regIdx} AND i.DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITM_SHARE_INVITE( GRO_IDX, INVITE_CODE, REG_IDX, DEL_YN, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{groIdx}, #{inviteCode}, #{regIdx}, 'N', NOW() )
